summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Boylston Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from Denny Way to John Street, by grading and paving the same and by constructing the necessary sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 259 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
